name: gotta go fast
description:
this really isn't much of a game, just made something basic to learn some stuff. made with polycode.

wave to twotail to get a +1, don't and get a sad face. run into eggguy to get both. followed the 2-button theme from LD34, but didn't finish it during the jam weekend.

source here

music by @threechainlinks

*game is actually really slow

**no actual chilidog eating

windows and mac versions not tested so who knows if they work
